name: Hoffman, Appellant, v. Mount Lebanon Cemetery Company
name_abbreviation: Hoffman v. Mount Lebanon Cemetery Co.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
parties: Hoffman, Appellant, v. Mount Lebanon Cemetery Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed on the opinion of the court below. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Samuel P. Lavine, with him Steinberg, Greenstein, Rickman & Price, for appellant.
Ronald N. Rutenberg, with him Harry A. Rutenberg, and Rutenberg, Rutenberg, Rutenberg & Rutenberg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Hoffman, Appellant, v. Mount Lebanon Cemetery Company.
Argued January 9, 1969.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
April 23, 1969:
Samuel P. Lavine, with him Steinberg, Greenstein, Rickman & Price, for appellant.
Ronald N. Rutenberg, with him Harry A. Rutenberg, and Rutenberg, Rutenberg, Rutenberg & Rutenberg, for appellee.
